Useful debugging. convertTypes TRUE, types specified types column used data type. Otherwise, left type character warnToError TRUE, warnings generated conversion raise error checkVersion TRUE, version mismatch package data x result error. FALSE, check skipped. useSchemeInXml TRUE, use scheme definition xml raise error xml contain scheme definition. False, use scheme definition corresponding installed package, even xml contains scheme definition. NULL (default), use definition xml contains definition, use corresponding definition installed package.

title: dmdScheme: A package containing the framework for Domain specific MetaData Schemes — pkg.dmdScheme
text: package provides framework called dmdScheme, makes easier develop domain specific metadata scheme: using spreadsheet base defining new scheme provides basic functionality new metadata scheme: including entering, validating, exporting saving new metadata makies easier enter new metadata: uising spreadsheet enter new metadata can imported exported xml package provides creator new Domain Specific MetaData Scheme: simple way discussing developing new scheme represented spreadsheet function create new R package new domain specific metadata scheme based spreadsheet containing definition inherits functionality package (validation, printing, export, import, ...) easy update new scheme based re-importing new version scheme spreadsheet simply calling one function easy extension functionality whole architecture based S3 methods new scheme inherits dmdScheme objects. package provides user Domain Specific MetaData Scheme: authorative definition example dmdScheme object definitions scheme R Excel spreadsheet entering metadata experiment functions validate metadata functions export metadata xml files, one per data file

title: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdSchemeSet object — read_excel
text: file name Excel file (.xls .xlsx) containing data read. keepData TRUE, data spreadsheet file kept (dmdScheme_example. FALSE, replaced one row NAs dmdScheme. used raw == FALSE. verbose give verbose progress info. Useful debugging. raw TRUE imported spreadsheet file returned object class dmdScheme_raw. FALSE, converted dmdScheme object. validate TRUE results validated using validate(validateData = FALSE, errorIfStructFalse = TRUE ).Consequently, error raised resulting scheme can successfully validated one package. many cases want change value FALSE. , result validated. can lead invalid schemes!.

title: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdSchemeSet object — read_excel
text: either raw = TRUE list data.frames worksheets   Class dmdScheme_raw, otherwise object class dmdSchemeSet

what: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdScheme_raw object — read_excel_raw
title: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdScheme_raw object — read_excel_raw
text: Reads data Excel file validation. validation scheme version scheme name done (checkVersion = TRUE).

title: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdScheme_raw object — read_excel_raw
code: read_excel_raw(file, verbose = FALSE, checkVersion = TRUE)

title: Read scheme data from Excel file into dmdScheme_raw object — read_excel_raw
text: file name Excel file (.xls .xlsx) containing data read. verbose give verbose progress info. Useful debugging. checkVersion TRUE, check version scheme conflicts package scheme version scheme version file. Aborts error conflict.

title: Functions to manage schemes — scheme_active
text: scheme_active(): Shows name version active scheme. scheme_default(): Shows name default scheme comes package can deleted. nameand version specified, default scheme used set. need internally!. Otherwise, scheme repository used returned. scheme_download(): Scheme definitions can stored online repo. default github repo https://github.com/Exp-Micro-Ecol-Hub/dmdSchemeRepository. function dowloads scheme definition, specified name version, saves locally name destfile scheme_install(): Installed schemes copied cache("installedSchemes") , necessary, .xlsx definition saved addition. can listed using scheme_list. scheme_install_r_package(): Install R package scheme name version definition using script install_R_package.R scheme package. scheme_installed(): Checks scheme installed scheme_list(): Lists definitions schemes installed. follows pattern SCHEMENAME_SCHEMEVERSION.EXT. files basename different extensions represent different representations scheme definition effectively equivalent, tab Documentation can found .xls files. scheme_list_in_repo(): Scheme definitions can stored online repo. scheme_repo(): Get set scheme repository. repo specified, scheme repository used set. Otherwise, scheme repository used returned. scheme_uninstall(): Installed schemes deleted cache("installedSchemes") moved temporary folder rteturned invisibly. scheme_use(): Switch current scheme new scheme defined scheme schemeDefinition. Installed schemes can listed using scheme_list(). New schemes can added library via call scheme_add(). name active scheme saved dmdScheme_active

title: Functions to manage schemes — scheme_active
code: scheme_active()  scheme_default(name = NULL, version = NULL)  scheme_download(   name,   version,   destfile = NULL,   overwrite = FALSE,   baseurl = scheme_repo(),   ... )  scheme_install(   name,   version,   repo = scheme_repo(),   file = NULL,   overwrite = FALSE,   install_package = FALSE )  scheme_install_r_package(name, version, reinstall = FALSE)  scheme_installed(name, version)  scheme_list()  scheme_list_in_repo(baseurl = scheme_repo(), ...)  scheme_repo(repo = NULL)  scheme_uninstall(name = NULL, version = NULL)  scheme_use(name = NULL, version = NULL)

title: Functions to manage schemes — scheme_active
text: name character string containing name scheme definition version character string containing version scheme definition destfile character string containing name downloaded scheme definition. NULL, temporary file used. overwrite TRUE, scheme overwritten exists baseurl character string containing base url repository scheme definitions located. ... additional parameter function download.file. repo repo schemes. file give, file used local scheme definition, repo ignored install_package TRUE, install / update accompanying R package. can manually later running scheme_install_r_package("NAME", "VERSION"). reinstall TRUE, R package uninstalled installing .

title: Version 1.2.10
text: move CRAN R-Universe due unreproducible errors CRAN checks move UZH-PEG github organisation update documentation based changes move pkgdown website

title: Version 1.2.1
text: maintenance release, moves openxlsx suggests section makes format_dmdScheme_xlsx() issue warning handling missing package openxlsx gracefully.

title: Version 1.2
text: CRAN release: 2020-06-12 feature add release. * Adds bibliometric metadata handling multiple “vertical” sheets * Adds autocreation index file summarises metadata * Adds additional tests New features : * default scheme (dmdScheme 0.9.9) includes bibliometric metadata * functions can now handle multiple “vertical” tabs / sheets * function make_index() creates index document , pandoc installed, converted word, pdf html format. based template file contains tokens replaced metadatafrom supplied scheme. * rewritten vignette

title: Version 1.1.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-05-29 Make use pandoc examples dontrun make CRAN happy

title: Version 1.1.3
text: CRAN release: 2020-05-28

title: Version 1.1.3
text: https://github.com/Exp-Micro-Ecol-Hub/dmdScheme/issues/23 caused errors validation due CR LF versus LF Excel sheet. NB: Description now ignored structural validation!

title: Version 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-03-18 Due incompatibilities new release tibble expected incompatibilities o=dplyr, two dependencies removed.

title: Version 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-01-10 Due change serialization format R 3.6.0, compatible R >= 3.5.0 suggestedValues validation , case fail, declassified Note (previous: Warning). Include wildcards regular expressions columnName DataFileMetaData. Wildcards (.e. * ?) enclosed three exclamation marks (!!!), e.g. Species_!!!*!!! match Species_1 well Species_Not KnownSoFar. Regular expressions need enclosed special characters. fix error minimum two rows imported, even second one contains NAs. Introduced exclusion NA rows (commit db53c83). Add error level print validation results Add xml import re-import xml data validate certain features (types) import.

title: Version 1.0.0
text: invalid xml export fixed missing export …ID fields
